meta_title: Why Cycle Counting is the Backbone of Maintenance Reliability
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces back to missing spares. Implement a cycle count strategy that ensures part availability and 99% inventory record accuracy.
title: Is Your Inventory Lying to You? Why the Cycle Count is the Only Way to Guarantee Maintenance Uptime

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Is Your Inventory Lying to You? Why the Cycle Count is the Only Way to Guarantee Maintenance Uptime

image_prompt: A professional photo-realistic scene in a modern, well-lit industrial warehouse. A diverse team of two maintenance professionals—one man and one woman—are performing an inventory audit. They are wearing full PPE, including white hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility neon vests over work shirts. One person is standing on a safety ladder checking a high shelf of organized mechanical components (large bearings and gearboxes), while the other stands below holding a ruggedized industrial tablet. We only see the back of the tablet, which is encased in a black protective shell. The warehouse background shows high-density racking with neatly labeled bins and a clean polished concrete floor. The focus is on the collaborative, methodical process of the count. No text or digital displays are visible. Full body shots showing professional work boots.
